 II. [<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שַׁ֫עַר‎</span>] **noun [masculine]** ==measure== (properly ***reckoning***); — plural <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מֵאָה שְׁעָרִים‎</span> [[Gen.26.12|Gen 26:12]] ([[BDB#J|J]]) 100 ***measures***, i.e. 100 for one = 100-fold. 

 <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎שָׁעָה‎</span> **noun feminine** ==brief time, moment== ([[BDB#Tg|ᵑ7]] ***id.***, <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎שָֽׁעֲתָא‎</span>, Late Hebrew <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שָׁעָה‎</span> ***time, hour***; Syriac <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***moment***, then ***hour*** [[BDB#Brock|Brock]]<sup>369</sup>, but Christian-Palestinian Aramaic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***moment, hour*** [[BDB#Schw|Schw]]<sup>Idioticon 97</sup> [[BDB#Schulth|Schulth]]<sup>Lex.211</sup>; perhaps = Assyrian <abbr title="transliteration"><u>***šattu, duration;***</u></abbr> Tel Amarna<sup>91, 77</sup> <abbr title="transliteration"><u>***še-ti***</u></abbr>, ***time, hour*** (as Canaanism) [[BDB#Wkl|Wkl]]<sup>KAT 3. 335</sup>; Arabic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,">, <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***portion*** of time, Ethiopic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***time***, <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***hour, time*** ([[BDB#Buhl|Buhl]] calls Arabic Ethiopic loan-words, but see [[BDB#Wkl|Wkl]]<sup>l.c</sup>); √ unknown: possibly Assyrian loan-word (see [[BDB#Wkl|Wkl]]<sup>l.c</sup>); [[BDB#Dl|Dl]]<sup>Pr 39 f.</sup> conjecture\* <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎שׁיע‎</span> = <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎שָׁעָה‎</span> ***look***, hence ***moment = 'Augenblick,'*** but verb <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎שׁ‎</span> rather of steadygaze); — ***moment:*** usually emphatic <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎בַּהּשַֿׁעֲתָא‎</span> (read possibly <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎שָֽׁ‎</span> as [[BDB#Tg|ᵑ7]] Syriac, [[BDB#Marti|M]]<sup>86 \* f.</sup> [[BDB#Buhl|Buhl]]<sup>14</sup> compare variant reading in [[BDB#Str|Str]]) ***in the same moment, forthwith*** [[Dan.3.6|Dan 3:6]]; [[Dan.3.15|Dan 3:15]]; [[Dan.4.30|Dan 4:30]]; [[Dan.5.5|Dan 5:5]] absolute <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎שָׁעָה חֲדָה‎</span> [[Dan.4.16|Dan 4:16]] ***for a moment***.
